item.title: [Problem solved - can a mod plz lock this topic]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

no. no. no, ANNNDDDD no.

if (command.startsWith("logout")){ disconnected = true; logoutButton = true; }
If your commands are in client.java, it should work.

Read full topic

item.title: [Problem solved - can a mod plz lock this topic]
item.dc:creator: @calebsomthing calebsomthing
item.description:
@calebsomthing wrote:

idk how to make the code thing u just made. lol but here…

if (command.startsWith(“logout”)) {
client player = null;
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null){
if(command.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase(server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)){
player = (client)server.playerHandler.players[i];
player.disconnected = true;
}
}
}
}

try that. i can’t promise it will work m8. if it don’t ill work on it later. makeing 2 HUGH squares for “guild” wars atm… promised server about a week ago i would >w< everyones been waiting on it. impationt peoples!!! >.< lol add me. ill try to help l8er.

Read full topic
